column4: Morning guys, I need to reboot my PC at home after my upgrade, I need it to mail me the new IP address I know i can use ifconfig | mail myemail@address.com but where do i need to put a script and how would it be formed? Thanks
Hell guys, having a hell of a time trying to install bzflag from CVS im it says libcurl is not install when in fact it is!
make sure to have the dev package
